overall.description: Perform an indirect stable sort using a sequence of keys.

keys.type: (k, N) array or tuple containing k (N,)-shaped sequences
keys.description: The k different “columns” to be sorted.  The last column (or row if keys is a 2D array) is the primary sort key.

axis.description: Axis to be indirectly sorted.  By default, sort over the last axis.

indices.description: Array of indices that sort the keys along the specified axis.
